articles.title: James Maddison completes Tottenham medical ahead of move from Leicester - The Athletic
articles.description:
James Maddison has completed his Tottenham medical ahead of his move from Leicester in a deal worth more than £40million.
The Athletic reported on Wednesday that Spurs and Leicester had agreed a fee for the England international, who had a year left to run on…
articles.content: Leicester were initially holding out for £60million ($76.4m), but Spurs will pay around £40m up front plus add-ons.Maddison had also attracted interest from Newcastle United, who had two bids rejecte… [+2549 chars]

articles.title: BTN3A3 evasion promotes the zoonotic potential of influenza A viruses - Nature.com
articles.description: A protein that evolved in primates, BTN3A3, is expressed in human airways and shows antiviral activity against avian IAVs but not against human IAVs.
